接口：活动签到
请求：fetch("https://bd2-webshop-api.bd2.pmang.cloud/api/event/attend-reward", {
  "headers": {
    "accept": "application/json",
    "accept-language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9",
    "authorization": "Bearer ",
    "content-type": "application/json",
    "priority": "u=1, i",
    "sec-ch-ua": "\"Google Chrome\";v=\"143\", \"Chromium\";v=\"143\", \"Not A(Brand\";v=\"24\"",
    "sec-ch-ua-mobile": "?0",
    "sec-ch-ua-platform": "\"Windows\"",
    "sec-fetch-dest": "empty",
    "sec-fetch-mode": "cors",
    "sec-fetch-site": "cross-site"
  },
  "referrer": "https://webshop.browndust2.global/",
  "body": "{\"eventScheduleId\":9}",
  "method": "POST",
  "mode": "cors",
  "credentials": "include"
});
响应：
签到成功：{
  "data": {
    "success": true,
    "errorType": 0,
    "errorMsg": "",
    "requestId": "5b261f20-2da8-40a5-902a-7eead25aa8a7",
    "rewardInfo": {
      "itemType": 1000,
      "itemId": 6
    },
    "userInfo": {
      "attendanceCount": 1,
      "lastAttendanceDate": "2026-01-16 00:22:55"
    }
  }
}
重复签到：{
    "data": {
        "success": false,
        "errorType": 5,
        "errorMsg": "Already reward today. (last_attendance_date: 2026-01-16 00:22:55)",
        "requestId": "bff816b5-ceda-4f39-8b68-f217951abd2e",
        "rewardInfo": {
            "itemType": 0,
            "itemId": 0
        },
        "userInfo": {
            "attendanceCount": 0,
            "lastAttendanceDate": ""
        }
    }
}
eventScheduleId=8，即签到过时活动时：{
    "data": {
        "success": false,
        "errorType": 6,
        "errorMsg": "Not exist reward day. (attendance_count: 8)",
        "requestId": "ef431399-f752-4b42-a395-2b0b2f340f5c",
        "rewardInfo": {
            "itemType": 0,
            "itemId": 0
        },
        "userInfo": {
            "attendanceCount": 0,
            "lastAttendanceDate": ""
        }
    }
}
eventScheduleId=10，即签到不存在的活动时：{
    "data": {
        "success": false,
        "errorType": 4,
        "errorMsg": "Not found event schedule. (eventScheduleId: 10)",
        "requestId": "afdcbf89-82f3-41b7-9751-dca0ba70a542",
        "rewardInfo": {
            "itemType": 0,
            "itemId": 0
        },
        "userInfo": {
            "attendanceCount": 0,
            "lastAttendanceDate": ""
        }
    }
}
接口：获取当前用户的签到信息
请求：fetch("https://bd2-webshop-api.bd2.pmang.cloud/api/event/event-user-info", {
  "headers": {
    "accept": "application/json",
    "accept-language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9",
    "authorization": "Bearer ",
    "priority": "u=1, i",
    "sec-ch-ua": "\"Google Chrome\";v=\"143\", \"Chromium\";v=\"143\", \"Not A(Brand\";v=\"24\"",
    "sec-ch-ua-mobile": "?0",
    "sec-ch-ua-platform": "\"Windows\"",
    "sec-fetch-dest": "empty",
    "sec-fetch-mode": "cors",
    "sec-fetch-site": "cross-site"
  },
  "referrer": "https://webshop.browndust2.global/",
  "body": null,
  "method": "POST",
  "mode": "cors",
  "credentials": "include"
});
响应：
签到前：{
  "data": {
    "attendanceCount": 0,
    "isLastAttendance": false,
    "scheduleInfo": {
      "startDate": "2026-01-15 10:00:00",
      "endDate": "2026-02-12 08:59:59",
      "eventScheduleId": 9
    }
  }
}
签到后：{
  "data": {
    "attendanceCount": 1,
    "isLastAttendance": true,
    "scheduleInfo": {
      "startDate": "2026-01-15 10:00:00",
      "endDate": "2026-02-12 08:59:59",
      "eventScheduleId": 9
    }
  }
}
